title: Friday Night Rivals honors scholar athlete winner of the week, Brandon Arentz
text:
Friday Night Rivals honors scholar athlete winner of the week, Brandon Arentz 
Updated: 
Posted by: Shannel Douglas 

SPRING GROVE -- Throughout the high school football season, Friday Night Rivals honors athletes who don't just excel on the field, but also in the classroom. One of this week's winner is Northeastern senior, Brandon Arentz. 

Brandon is a three sport athlete excelling in football, soccer and boys volleyball. He has a 3.9 GPA and plans on attending Penn State to study engineering. 

Scholar athlete winners have a chance to win a $3,000 scholarship thanks to Subway. Related Stories 
LAMAR ODOM - THE INVESTIGATION 
LAS VEGAS (AP) -- While his health is getting better, Lamar Odom's legal situation might be in peril. Business News

BEIJING (AP) -- China has cut interest rates for a sixth time in a year to spur slowing growth in the world's second-largest economy.
